title: Spider's Web in the Green Mountains
description: A shot in the night--Cooper North just retired, after years as a Vermont prosecutor, but now she's back investigating. And this time it's personal.Why are black motorcycles roaring past her house? Who is threatening Henry, her Pembroke Welsh corgi? What is troubling the new detective from the NYPD? And who wants to kill Cooper North?
author: Richard Wolkomir
